description:
In this 8 week course, Dr. Kamala Easton will guide you in Spiritual Transformation from a grounded real world place.

How does one actually become one with the Divine? Is this idea a myth or a possibility during our lifetime? Kamala Easton, Ph.D., a modern day mystic will share knowledge and practices which ALLOW the Spirit of Life to flow through our beings and assist us in merging into our own Divine Self.

Learn how to trust and become one with your own Higher Self.On a day to day basis merge into the Oneness of Spirit.Week 1 helps you to break down concepts of God/Divinity that have kept you from truly understanding that you are that.

We begin to clear a path to His or Her name.
title: Enlightenment & Spiritual Transformation - Week 1
